io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.adapters.file

Class FileSourceDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.adapters.AbstractSourceDataSet
      • io.elegie.luchess.core.indexing.adapters.file.FileSourceDataSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SourceDataSet

    public class FileSourceDataSet
extends AbstractSourceDataSet
    A SourceDataSet implementation for the file system. The set of data to be indexed will be populated from files contained within a top directory, possibly filtered with a FileSelector.

    • Constructor Summary

        public FileSourceDataSet(java.io.File source,

                 boolean renameAfterProcessing)
        Parameters:
        source - The top directory.
        selector - The selector to be used to filter out files.
        renameAfterProcessing - Should the processed files be renamed?
